text: Ellison DuRant “Cotton Ed” Smith (August 1, 1864 – November 17, 1944) was a politician from South Carolina. He was a senator from South Carolina from 1909 to 1944. He was popular because of his segregationist views. He was a Democrat. Category:1864 births Category:1944 deaths Category:United States senators from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Ellison D. Smith
